request.schema: [{"name": "idempotency_token", "label": "Idempotency token", "type": "string", "control_type": "text", "optional": false, "hint": "Client-generated UUID for idempotency"}, {"name": "manager_email", "label": "Manager email", "type": "string", "control_type": "text", "optional": false, "hint": "Manager email address"}, {"name": "manager_first_name", "label": "Manager first name", "type": "string", "control_type": "text", "optional": false, "hint": "Manager first name"}, {"name": "manager_last_name", "label": "Manager last name", "type": "string", "control_type": "text", "optional": false, "hint": "Manager last name"}, {"name": "room_number", "label": "Room number", "type": "string", "control_type": "text", "optional": false, "hint": "Hotel room number"}, {"name": "type", "label": "Type", "type": "string", "control_type": "text", "optional": false, "hint": "Case type (Maintenance, Facilities)"}, {"name": "priority", "label": "Priority", "type": "string", "control_type": "text", "optional": false, "hint": "Priority level (Low, Medium, High, Urgent)"}, {"name": "description", "label": "Description", "type": "string", "control_type": "text", "optional": false, "hint": "Detailed description of the maintenance issue"}]

response.error_message: Manager contact with email #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","manager_email"]}')} does not exist. Manager must be registered before submitting requests.

Contact #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","manager_email"]}')} is type #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"search_contact","path":["result","contact_type"]}')}. Only Manager contacts can submit maintenance requests.
Room #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","room_number"]}')} does not exist. Cannot create maintenance request for non-existent room.
